segments.text: What do you think of the apartment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like it , but there is one problem .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The faucet in the kitchen is leaking .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don ’ t understand what the big deal is .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That leak is a problem for my water bill .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What you would like me to do about it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I won ’ t be able to fix it at the moment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will not rent the apartment with that leaking faucet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If that ’ s the case , then I will fix the faucet .
segments.speaker: S1
